    • Constructor Detail

      • Droid

        public Droid(Team team,
             int hitpoints,
             java.lang.String name,
             MessageRenderer m,
             SWWorldBase world)
        Create a Droid. Droids will randomly choose a direction and wander around the playfield until it meets edges. and attack anything they can (if they can attack something, they will). They are members of team GOOD or EVIL, so their attempts to attack other same team Droids won't be effective but attack different team Droids will be effective.
        Parameters:
        team - the team that the Droid belongs to. Generally, if a Droid has a owner, the team of the Droid is the same as its owner.
        hitpoints - the number of hit points of this Droid. If this decreases to below zero, the Droid become immobile.
        name - this droid's name. Used in displaying descriptions.
        m - MessageRenderer to display messages.
        world - the SWWorld world to which this Droid belongs to

      • Droid
